name: crave-app
description: Local food and drink discovery app

scripts.dev:backend: concurrently "npm run dev:auth" "npm run dev:posts" "npm run dev:business" "npm run dev:users" "npm run dev:gateway"
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run db:migrate
scripts.install:all: npm ci && npm run install:backend && npm run install:mobile
scripts.install:backend: concurrently "npm --prefix backend/auth-service ci" "npm --prefix backend/post-service ci" "npm --prefix backend/business-service ci" "npm --prefix backend/user-service ci" "npm --prefix backend/api-gateway ci"
